title: BECIL Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 02 Multi Tasking Staff Posts
description: Broadcast Engineering Consultants India Limited (BECIL) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 02 Multi-Tasking Staff Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the BECIL Recruitment 2025 .
